name: ZoneDriver
description: Races in the stalkers' setting, developed by the efforts of two enthusiasts. Check your accuracy at the wheel of a flying bucket. The game does not try to be a substitute for your favorite entertainment, but it can give you several hours of fun if you give it a chance.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 3,2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 6800 / ATI X1800 (256 MB) DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Directx 9.0c compatible Additional Notes: Internet speed 512 Kbps
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX660 / Radeon HD 7850 (2GB) DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Directx 9.0c compatible Additional Notes: Internet speed 1024 Kbps (for voice chat)
